item.description:
When: Wednesday, 12:30 to 2 PM

Hello all!

We are running a Summer Lunch Meetup over at MIT. This will act as the summer extension to the Japanese Lunch Table language exchange that already takes place at MIT during the academic year. We meet every Wednesday from 12:30 to 2:00 pm. Of course, all ages are welcome and feel free to bring friends, family, and a lunch.

Until we have a more permanent location established, please go to the dining area on the 1st floor of the Stata Center. If available, we will try to meet in the small room that displays "MIT Libraries" on its doors (we met there last time).

Stata Center can be easily reached from the Kendall/MIT T stop.

Please check out this web page for 4 photos of Stata Center (trust me, this building is very easy to find):
http://www.csail.mit....

Also, I have edited a small MIT campus map that can be found here:
http://www.mit.edu/~r...

Simple directions:
From the Kendall/MIT T Stop, follow along Main Street past The Coop, The Kendall, Legal Sea Foods, and Ames Street. Stata Center will be on your left on the corner of Vassar and Main Street.

In case any of you have difficulties finding our meetup location, I will be sending out an e-mail to all of you with contact information for Yutaka and myself.

See you then!
item.name: Summer Lunch Table (Language Exchange)
